title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.6 - Rules for inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 922.6 - Rules for inspection

State Regulations
(a) The
mechanical officer in charge at each point where boiler or steam reservoir
repair work is done will be held responsible for the inspection and repair of
all locomotive boilers, steam reservoirs and their appurtenances under his
jurisdiction. He must know that all defects disclosed by any inspection are
properly repaired before the locomotive is returned to service. (b) The term "inspector" as used in this

Part, unless otherwise specified, will be held to mean the operator's
inspector. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
922.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
